attributes.action: Demolish buildings that not been used for 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In every city, there are some buildings which have stood empty for 10 years plus. With boards on the windows, weeds (and even trees) growing out of the brickwork, the chances of rescuing the building is remote. All empty buildings do is make an area scruffy plus it's a health and safety issue.
